command.text: select "Emp_Permission_Details"."SID" "SID" ,"Emp_Permission_Details"."TDate" "TDate" ,"Emp_Permission_Details"."Day_SID" "Day_SID" ,"Emp_Permission_Details"."Emp_Permission_SID" "Emp_Permission_SID" ,"Emp_Permission_S"."Emp_No" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_No" ,"Emp_Permission_SPerm_Type_S"."Perm_Code" "Emp_Permission_SPerm_Type_SPerm_Code" ,"Emp_Permission_SPerm_S"."Perm_Code" "Emp_Permission_SPerm_SPerm_Code" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Emp_NOt" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Emp_NOt" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_salrycat"."grade_desc_a" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_salrycatgrade_desc_a" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Blood_Type"."ModifiedBy" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Blood_TypeModifiedBy" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Bnk_"."Bnk_Acc" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Bnk_Bnk_Acc" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_Acc" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Sub_BnkBnk_Acc" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Depm_"."Depm_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Depm_Depm_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Educt_Type"."Educt_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Educt_TypeEduct_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_Stu"."Emp_Stunm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_StuEmp_Stunm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Earning_"."Earning_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Earning_Earning_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Gender"."Gender" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_GenderGender" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_"."Job_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_Job_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Loc_"."Loc_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Loc_Loc_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Reljan"."Reljan_nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_ReljanReljan_nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_Status_Type"."Status_Nm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Status_TypeStatus_Nm" ,"Emp_Permission_SEmp_branch"."Desc1" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_branchDesc1" from "dbo"."Emp_Permission_Details" "Emp_Permission_Details" left join "dbo"."Emp_Permissions" "Emp_Permission_S" on "Emp_Permission_Details"."Emp_Permission_SID" = "Emp_Permission_S"."SID" left join "dbo"."Permission_Types" "Emp_Permission_SPerm_Type_S" on "Emp_Permission_S"."Perm_Type_SID" = "Emp_Permission_SPerm_Type_S"."SID" left join "dbo"."Permissions" "Emp_Permission_SPerm_S" on "Emp_Permission_S"."Perm_SID" = "Emp_Permission_SPerm_S"."SID" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_" on "Emp_Permission_S"."Emp_No" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_sgm" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."sgm" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."grade" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_salrycat" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."salrycat" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_salrycat"."grade_code" left join "dbo"."pyBlood" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Blood_Type" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Blood_Type" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Blood_Type"."Blood_Type" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Bnk_" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Bnk_No" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Bnk_"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Sub_Bnk" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Sub_Bnk" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Cntry_" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Cntry_No" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pydepm" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Depm_" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Depm_No" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Depm_"."Depm_No" left join "dbo"."PyempEdu" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Educt_Type" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Educt_Type" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Educt_Type"."Educt_Type" left join "dbo"."Pyempstu" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_Stu" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Job_Stu" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_Stu"."Emp_stu" left join "dbo"."Pyerntsalyp1" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Earning_" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Earning_no" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Earning_"."Earning_No" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Gender" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Genderid" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Gender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."Pyjobs" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Job_No" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Job_"."Job_No" left join "dbo"."PyLocation" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Loc_" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Loc_No" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Loc_"."loc_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Ownr_" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Ownr_No" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Reljan" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Reljan" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Reljan"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Status_Type" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."Status_Type" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_Status_Type"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Emp_Permission_SEmp_branch" on "Emp_Permission_SEmp_"."branch" = "Emp_Permission_SEmp_branch"."branch"
